name: Dawoodi Bohra Marasiya- AlHuzn
description: With the Raza and Dua Mubarak of Aqa Moula Syedna Mufaddal Saifuddin (TUS) - AlHuzn has been designed specially for the benefits of Dawoodi Bohra Mumineen and Zakir-e-Husain (Zakereens).   Special Features of the App :- ------------------------------------------------ *AlHuzn Radio *Monthly MIQAAT wise Audios/PDFs *Notification about MIQAATs *DUAs/HAFTIs *Namaaz  *Mumineen Request Section *Easy-to-use *Tasbeeh Counter *Regular updates ------------------------------------------------ The App also Contains :-  Audios & PDFs of *Quran *Marasiya *Madeh *Naat *Salam *Nasihat *Rasa  and many other helpful sections like Tips & Tricks for Zakereens to keep their voice clear.  At present AlHuzn database has 700+ including both audios & PDFs, also we keep on adding new audios/PDFs very often. User can also Request any audio/PDF they need which is not in our database and we try to provide it at the earliest.   User Notification to inform about updates.  The Search feature which allow you to search the entire database of AlHuzn whether Audio or PDF.  We have tried to build a most Easy-to-Use App. We hope Mumineen will like it and use it.  Khuda ta Aala, Aqa Moula Syedna Mufaddal Saifuddin Moula TUS ni umr shareef ne qyamaat na din lag daraz ane daraz kare...Ameen  Please note that few features of the App are under Beta mode, if any error found mail us- team@alhuzn.com.
